text: Marcel Christian Barbeau (February 18, 1925 - January 2, 2016) was a Canadian artist. His best known works are Fenêtre sur l'avenir and Fenêtre sur l'avenir, both in Montreal. Barbeau was born in Montreal, Quebec. He studied with Paul-Émile Borduas. In 1995, he was made an Officer of the Order of Canada. He was a member of the Royal Canadian Academy of Arts. He had two children. Barbeau died on January 2, 2016 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Canadian painters Category:Order of Canada Category:People from Montreal
